list.description:
Привет ребят!
Оцениваем. Лайкаем. Скачиваем!

#komisan #komi_san_wa_comyushou_desu #anime #bunny #sight

#murderdrones #murder_drones #tessa #all_tanks

artist: https://x.com/mnimi_x/status/1898513872148942858?t=WX_nn6tDBoMmOenF6CsZWQ&s=19

Сделан прицел по персонажу Ремилия Скарлет из игры Touhou Project
Если хотите ещё персонажей от меня, пишите в наш дискорд

A sight was made for the character Remilia Scarlet from the Touhou Project game
If you want more characters from me, write to our discord.

#touhou #touhou_project #sight #all_tanks #tank #anime #remilia_scarlet #warthunder

Nishi from Girls und Panzer. You lovely people get a 3-sight package this time!

戦車、前進！Sensha, zenshin!

3 versions - "closed_no_shading", "open_no_shading", and "open_with_shade", respectively. I did kinda have to extrapolate for the hair on the latter two files, so excuse me if they aren't a perfect representation of Kinuyo's hairstyles :)

Discord is MrJ4zzy for requests or questions! OR just drop a comment on one of my posts.

#kinuyo_nishi #chihatan #japan #gup #girls_und_panzer #tank #anime

#hololive #hololive_en #raora_panthera #anime #vtuber #sight

Прицел с vtuber Raora Panthera.

Rosehip from Girls und Panzer.

Darjeeling, I'm telling you - I need to remove that limiter!

Shaded and non-shaded versions included!

Discord is MrJ4zzy for requests or questions!

#rosehip #stgloriana #great_britain #gup #girls_und_panzer #tank #anime

#Undertale #W_D_Gaster
Прицел с персонажем W.D.Gaster из Undertale.

Не думаю что его кто-то будет скачивать, просто так сказать "развеять тишину".

Alisa from Girls und Panzer.

Remaining tanks, guide on me!

Versions with and without shading.

Discord is MrJ4zzy for requests or questions!

#alisa #saunders #usa #gup #girls_und_panzer #tank #anime

Sayori
#ddlc #anime

Nonna from Girls und Panzer.

Katyusha, get down please. You need to study...

As always, 2 versions - with and without shading (I was more conservative with it this time).

Discord is MrJ4zzy for requests or questions!

#nonna #pravda #ussr #gup #girls_und_panzer #tank #anime

Привет, этой мой первый прицел, прошу не бить сильно тапками.
Прицел сделан по персонажу Reimu из игре Touhou Project.
Если хотите еще персонажей от меня, пишите в нашем дискорде

Hi, this is my first sight, please don't hit me too hard with your sneakers.
The sight is based on the Reimu character from the Touhou Project game.
If you want more characters from me, write in our discord

#touhou #touhou_project #anime #warthunder #sight #reimu #all_tanks #tank

My 3rd sight
#miku #hatsune #hatsunemiku #anime

Helmet-Chan from Girls und Panzer.

"What the hell is she laughing at?"

Discord is MrJ4zzy for requests or questions!

#helmet-chan #saunders #usa #gup #girls_und_panzer #tanks #anime

Here you go, all in one. Shoot down all the planes and destroy all the tanks to your heart's content in SB and TRB.

1. Below are squares for dropping bombs with a distance.
Colored marks for different speeds, distances and angles of attack

2. In the circle is a sight for planes:

1) Fighters
- in width and length - 200 m, 400 m, 900 m, 1200 m

2) Heavy (Tu-2, Pe-2) - in width - 400 m, 800 m
in length - like fighters - 200 m, 400 m, 900 m, 1200 m

3) Bombers (B-17, Pe-8) - in width - 500 m, 800 m, 1200
in length - like heavy ones - 400 m, 800 m



EDIT 28/03/25 for Heavy a...

Yukari from Girls und Panzer.

Enemy spotted! Give this little floof some love <3

Files contain version without shading.

Discord is MrJ4zzy for requests or questions!

#yukari #oorai #oarai #gup #girls_und_panzer #girlsundpanzer #tanks #anime

ANON TOKYO

DESTROY YOUR ENEMIES NOW WITH YUNYUN!

Have fun using it!

#anime #konosuba #yunyun #konosubarashisekainishukufukuwo

yo (/≧▽≦)/

SteamySnuggler sight

https://www.twitch.tv/steamysnuggler

#all_tanks #universal #anime #vtuber #steamysnuggler

Hello everyone. I decided to try something new, and make a sight. I know this image has been done before, but this was a test sight that I decided to make. If you have any tips on what I should do for future sight, feel free to type them in the comments. I'll probably stick to skins unless someone requests it or I just feel like making one. Hope you enjoy.
